I am attending the Munich Security Conference as part of the congressional delegation led by @SpeakerPelosi and in my role as Chairman of the House Foreign Affairs Committee’s Europe, Eurasia, Energy, and the Environment Subcommittee.

I am proud to be an original cosponsor of the #GreenNewDeal Resolution led in the House by @AOC and in the Senate by @SenMarkey. The time to act on the climate crisis is so long overdue. 
Communities like ours have seen signs of what is to come if we don’t address this emergency.
